data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, Niel L. (2017): Review of the species of the Cirolana ‘ parva - group’ (Cirolanidae: Isopoda: Crustacea) in Indonesian and Singaporean waters. Zootaxa 4317 (3): 401-435, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4317.3.1|43 occurrences
